mapper.select: SELECT v.video_id, v.writer_seq, u.nickname, v.title, v.content, v.view_cnt, v.created_at, v.is_edited, v.part, v.video_key FROM video v JOIN user u ON v.writer_seq = u.user_seq ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT v.video_id, v.writer_seq, u.nickname, v.title, v.content, v.view_cnt, v.created_at, v.is_edited, v.part, v.video_key FROM video v JOIN user u ON v.writer_seq = u.user_seq WHERE video_id=#{videoId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video (writer_seq, title, content, part, video_key) VALUES (#{writerSeq}, #{title}, #{content}, #{part}, #{videoKey})
